name: Run Knight Run - Magic Castle
description:
Run Knight Run - Magic Castle. Brings you to the mestery world of treasures buried in ancient castles and temples.

All you need is run the dungeon of broken castle collect as much treasures as possible.

Controls : one tap - jump ; tap-tap - double jump;

Features : retro pixel graphics, cool retro music and sfx; simple controlls; share your friends game results with screenshot proof of your skills or challenge with players all over the world for top - 10 place
